title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann Movie: Lagann-hen
title_en: Gurren Lagann The Movie: The Lights in the Sky are Stars
title_jp: 天元突破グレンラガン 螺巌篇
synopsis: Valiantly persevering through the traumatic aftermath of Kamina's death, Team Dai-Gurren collectively destroys the Four Generals and finally reaches Teppelin, the royal capital, where Simon wins a fierce battle against the Spiral King, Lordgenome.
